name: Access Token Invalidate
description: This API invalidates the active access token or expires an access token validity.

Get Params.name: access_token
Get Params.description: Uniquely generated identifier key by LoginRadius that is activated after successful authentication.

Get Params.name: preventRefresh
Get Params.description: Boolean value that when set as true, in addition of the access_token being invalidated, it will no longer have the capability of being refreshed.
